articles.description: The UK will receive 10 million AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine doses made by the Serum Institute of India (SII), the UK government said in a statement on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Serum Institute of India is mass producing the AstraZeneca vaccine. (File)
